= Introduction =
This page explains how to install customwars

== Installing ==
Unpack the downloaded zip file to $install_dir, where install_dir can be any dir you choose for example: (c:/program files/CW2/)

The next steps are different for each OS:

* Windows:
  # Go to the $install_dir 
  # Double click on CustomWars.bat to launch the game

* Linux/Mac:
  # Go to the $install_dir
  # Double click on CustomWars.sh to launch the game

Requirements:
java 1.6+
